In environment T : System H : Inconsistent LNN T Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNN) (_ : Prf LNN Axm (existH ?M1458 ?M1457)), forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) ?M1456 g" with "exists (f : Formula) (v : nat), (forall x : nat, In x (freeVarFormula LNN f) -> v = x) /\\ SysPrf T (existH v (notH f)) /\\ (forall n : nat, SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v (natToTerm n)))".

exceptions.tactic: apply sysWeaken with (g := substituteFormula LNN f v (natToTerm n)).
exceptions.exn: The reference n was not found in the current environment.
The reference H3 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros T H. unfold wInconsistent. intros. destruct H as [f [v [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. exists f, v. split. - apply H1. - split. + apply sysWeaken with (g := existH v (notH f)). apply H2. + intros n. apply existI. apply sysWeaken with (g := substituteFormula LNN f v (natToTerm n)). apply H3.
